channel.title: Analytics on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in Analytics on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: On being quiet – and being busy: impact on web analytics and content strategy
item.description: You may not have noticed, but I have - I’ve been quiet, and not been adding any new posts or updates to any of my WordPress plugin.

item.title: 19 of the best WordPress Plugins to use with your Multisite Network (or What Plugins Im Using)
item.description: I’ve been running WordPress as a multisite network and I often get asked about what are the best plugins for WordPress.

item.title: Twitter a few suggested alternatives to CoTweet or Hootsuite
item.description: Are you responsible for Twitter and Social Media in your business?

item.title: Piwik Web Analytics best free alternative
item.description: Have you tried Piwik yet? If you’ve been using Google Analytics and started to wonder what alternative web analytic tools are out there then look no further then Piwik.

item.title: Thank You - 47% growth YOY - 31,000 visitors and 14,000 presentation views
item.description: What a year 2011 was … over 31,000 people visited my site which is a growth of about 47% year on year.

item.title: WordPress: 9 Plugins for any new install
item.description: WordPress is one of the World’s most used web and blog tools - it has 1000’s of plugins that add functionality to your website.

item.title: Thinkup - Social Media Monitoring (made easier) tools
item.description: Thinkup - If you want to run your own social media monitoring tool then try this.

item.title: Google Analytics - Event Tracking
item.description: Google Analytics provides a number of extra tools for the adventurous to improve tracking and provide valuable insights.

item.title: Most Popular December 2010
item.description: December 2010 has been and gone - so it’s Happy New Year and welcome 2011.

item.title: Most Popular Posts for 2010 a year in review
item.description: **2010 has been and gone - so it’s time to welcome 2011.

item.title: 20,000 visitors so far this year
item.description: So its mid-November and I’m just looking at the Google Analytics report to see how I’m getting on.
